content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(2.5, 2.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Electric pole (position 2.5, 2.5)
- Lab (position 2.5, 2.5) - currently not powered

### Copper plate mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of following entities:
- Furnace (position 0, 0) - currently has fuel but no ingredients to smelt
- Furnace (position 2, 0) - currently has fuel but no ingredients to smelt
- Chest (position 3.5, 0.5) - currently empty

### Copper cable factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position not specified)
- Inserter (position not specified) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position not specified) that connects the furnace to the assembling machine

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing new pole
- Ensure that the first argument is a valid Prototype object before attempting to place a new pole.

### Errors when the lab is not powered
- Make sure to connect the lab to a power source to enable its functionality.

### Errors when lacking required ingredients for research
- Ensure you have the necessary ingredients, such as the automation science pack, in sufficient quantity to complete the research.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
